name: Blameless - A god game
description:
Be the shepherd to the people and guide them to survive and thrive.

Blameless is a game about managing followers and steering them in the right direction. No direct control over anything. You can inspire followers to do something and they'll keep that in mind when they act.

Blameless is currently free of charge, if you want to help out a starting indie developer please consider donating a dollar or two!
